author: Special Correspondent
text: Two unidentified persons snatched a Rs. 2.50 lakh-worth gold chain from a teacher when she was returning home on a bike on Thursday evening. Police said that the two waylaid H. Angel Gnana Malar (33) of Donavur near Ervadi, and snatched her chain, weighing about 10 sovereigns. Ms. Gnana Malar was returning home from her school at Poolam near Nanguneri on a bike with her father Bhagat Singh when the incident occurred. Based on her complaint, Moontradaippu police have registered a case.
title: Chain snatched from teacher
